Democrats continue to put politics before solutions. Yesterday they voted to place the needs of illegal immigrants before American service members by passing H.R. 3525.  Democrats also refused to consider amendments protecting veterans. We should always place our veterans first

We all need to stand together and unite against the opioid and addiction epidemic. pic.twitter.com/9NI3NUAtpq

On the basis of an anonymous source, @TheDemocrats have decided to launch impeachment proceedings against @realDonaldTrump. This political distraction is based upon a second-hand account from an unnamed insider. Let’s consider the source before we engage in political histrionics

Supporting local volunteer fire departments is important to me- pictured below is my father and grandfather in 1968. Grandpa was the President of Company 17 in Centreville, VA at that time and Dad was a Junior Fireman pic.twitter.com/IhDj0xt9R0

This afternoon I visited Drake's Branch Fire and Rescue to check on their recovery efforts.  Their firehouse was destroyed by Hurricane Michael last fall.  Thank you to @USDA for the aid you have provided, including the new hose! 
#VA05 pic.twitter.com/1BxcJRdidV

I am working with my colleagues in the Freshman Working Group on Addiction to find creative ways to #EndTheAddictionCrisis. During National #RecoveryMonth, we support our #VA05 community members in recovery. Google's new Recover Together platform can help: http://g.co/recovertogether

Today is the 18th anniversary of the #September11 attacks.  The impact of those attacks was not limited to that day and history will write that heroic Americans responded with valor and bravery. God Bless America.

#NeverForget #911Anniversary https://youtu.be/_9F9SvjBXy4
